amendment.description: Amendment requires all legacy tank cars retrofitted for continued Class 3 Flammable Liquid service to include enhanced top fittings protections for pressure relief valves.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require all legacy tank cars retrofit for continued Class 3 Flammable Liquid service to include enhanced top fittings protections for pressure relief valves.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barletta amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Barletta to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Barletta to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barletta amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
